warthamana palakayin balaya athatagena merata janathawa ilakka karagena kisidu wadak nokara mulu ratama parihaniyakata pathkirime, dewarsha purnaya, prithiyen samarana me mohothe ethuma perada, thamange mara hamudawa, polisiya, ha hamudawa yoda hambanthota janathawata sidukala winashaya daka udamwa, me rajaya kisiwekutath bida damiya nohaki bawata udana wakyak lesa pala kalaha.,methumage wisheshithaya wanne, uthure hamuda kadawuru iwath karamin ema palathe janathawata idam labadena athara warayedima, ee iwath karana hamudawama yodawa balayapa dakune janathawage idam kollakame prathipaththiyak anugamanaya kirimayi.

esema mema jawaram walata amatharawa wathman eksath jathika paksha aanduwa yatathe sidu wu dawantha jawaram sambandhayen kala prashna kirimedi ohu pawasa aththe, eewa wimarshanaya kirima sandaha thama komitiyak path karana bawayi.
